archiveInfo.title: VidVoyager Video Prompt Archive
archiveInfo.description: Auto-generated weekly video prompts stored for customer access

videoPrompts.prompt: Create a 60-second product showcase video for trending kitchen gadgets. Focus on air fryer accessories with high ROI potential. Include price comparison overlays and call-to-action for arbitrage opportunities.
Generate promotional video content for back-to-school electronics. Target tablets, headphones, and accessories with verified profit margins. Include competitor analysis and pricing strategy overlays.
Create explainer video for fitness equipment arbitrage opportunities. Focus on resistance bands, yoga mats, and small workout gear with consistent demand patterns.
